This extension enables voice typing across all websites with customizable commands. It extends ChatGPT with voice control and read-aloud features using advanced voice recognition and text-to-speech (TTS) technologies. Which allows you to have voice conversations with ChatGPT in multiple languages. This extension helps you communicate with the AI without typing. You can send voice queries to the AI and listen to its responses with ease. The voice typing feature is available for all websites.

Features:
тАв Advanced voice control for ChatGPT, Mistral AI and Poe which allows you to talk to the AIs.
тАв Enables voice typing across all websites with customizable commands.
тАв Extends ChatGPT with voice control and voice input in multilanguage.
тАв Hear the AI's response in a natural voice.
тАв Ability to change ChatGPT's voice (text-to-speech voice) and language.
тАв Ability to adjust the AI's speaking speed to hear the response slowly or fast.
тАв Customizable message-sending options (Send messages automatically after you finish speaking or when you use a custom voice command or manually).
тАв Customizable voice command to clear message input.
тАв Automatic detection of the language of response messages for text-to-speech voice.
тАв Adds read aloud or listen button for each message for listening messages again.
тАв Highlights the sentence or phrase you're currently listening to. Which helps improve understanding and comprehension.
тАв Easily customizable keyboard shortcuts.
тАв Real-time answers and conversations.
тАв Seamless voice interface integration, voice chat, and voice typing.

With this extension, you can use your voice to:
тАв Talk to ChatGPT using your microphone in over 145 languages!
тАв Ask questions and hear responses from ChatGPT with a natural voice.
тАв Use customizable voice commands to send messages and more.

Perfect for users tired of typing out queries and responses to the AI. Plus, you can also use this read-aloud feature to hear the AI's responses read back to you in a clear and natural voice. This feature is perfect for users who prefer to listen instead of read, or who want to learn new languages by listening to AI's responses in different tongues.

This extension is easy to install and use, and it works seamlessly with the AI's existing features. Simply install the extension, turn on the microphone, and start chatting with the AI like never before! Voice control (voice recognition) is available in more than 145 languages including English, Spanish, Mandarin Chinese, Russian, Hindi, Bengali, and more.

Usage guide:
тАв After installing the extension, access the settings by clicking on the тЪЩя╕П icon located near the ChatGPT input field. From here, you can change the voice control and input language, adjust the speaking speed, and set custom voice commands and keyboard shortcuts to make your experience more personalized.
тАв To activate ChatGPT voice control, simply click on the ЁЯОЩя╕П icon or press the "X" key outside the input field to start speaking.
тАв For longer voice inputs with multiple sentences, press and hold the "X" key until you finish speaking.
тАв To listen to a specific message or to hear it again, click on the ЁЯФИ icon located on the right side of the message.
тАв To turn read-aloud on or off, simply click on the ЁЯФИ icon located near the AI's input field.
тАв For voice typing, on any website just right-click on the input field, choose "Voice typing" from the menu, click the ЁЯОЩя╕П icon, and start speaking to type without using the keyboard.

Don't hesitate to explore the settings and customize your experience to best suit your needs!

long.en_AU,en_GB:
This extension extends ChatGPT with voice control and read-aloud features using advanced voice recognition and text-to-speech (TTS) technologies. Which allows you to have voice conversations with ChatGPT in multiple languages. This extension helps you communicate with the AI without typing. You can send voice queries to the AI and listen to its responses with ease.

Features:
тАв Extends ChatGPT with voice control and voice input in multilanguage.
тАв Hear the AI's response in a natural voice.
тАв Ability to change ChatGPT's voice (text-to-speech voice) and language.
тАв Ability to adjust the AI's speaking speed to hear the response slowly or fast.
тАв Customizable message-sending options (Send messages automatically after you finish speaking or when you use a custom voice command or manually).
тАв Customizable voice command to clear message input.
тАв Automatic detection of the language of response messages for text-to-speech voice.
тАв Adds read aloud or listen button for each message for listening messages again.
тАв Highlights the sentence or phrase you're currently listening to. Which helps improve understanding and comprehension.
тАв Easily customizable keyboard shortcuts.
тАв Real-time answers and conversations.
тАв Seamless voice interface integration, voice chat, and voice typing.

With this extension, you can use your voice to:
тАв Talk to ChatGPT using your microphone in over 145 languages!
тАв Ask questions and hear responses from ChatGPT with a natural voice.
тАв Use customizable voice commands to send messages and more.

Perfect for users tired of typing out queries and responses to the AI. Plus, you can also use this read-aloud feature to hear the AI's responses read back to you in a clear and natural voice. This feature is perfect for users who prefer to listen instead of read, or who want to learn new languages by listening to AI's responses in different tongues.

This extension is easy to install and use, and it works seamlessly with the AI's existing features. Simply install the extension, turn on the microphone, and start chatting with the AI like never before! Voice control (voice recognition) is available in more than 145 languages including English, Spanish, Mandarin Chinese, Russian, Hindi, Bengali, and more.

Usage guide:
тАв After installing the extension, access the settings by clicking on the тЪЩя╕П icon located near the ChatGPT input field. From here, you can change the voice control and input language, adjust the speaking speed, and set custom voice commands and keyboard shortcuts to make your experience more personalized.
тАв To activate ChatGPT voice control, simply click on the ЁЯОЩя╕П icon or press the "Space" key outside the input field to start speaking.
тАв For longer voice inputs with multiple sentences, press and hold the "Space" key until you finish speaking.
тАв To listen to a specific message or to hear it again, click on the ЁЯФИ icon located on the right side of the message.
тАв To turn read-aloud on or off, simply click on the ЁЯФИ icon located near the AI's input field.
Don't hesitate to explore the settings and customize your experience to best suit your needs!

long.nl:
Deze extensie breidt ChatGPT uit met spraakbesturing en voorleesfuncties, met behulp van geavanceerde spraakherkenning en tekst-naar-spraak (TTS) technologie├лn. Hierdoor kun je gesprekken voeren met ChatGPT via spraak in meerdere talen. Deze extensie helpt je om te communiceren met de AI zonder te typen. Je kunt spraakopdrachten naar de AI sturen en gemakkelijk luisteren naar de antwoorden.

Kenmerken:
тАв Breidt ChatGPT uit met spraakbesturing en spraakinvoer in meerdere talen.
тАв Hoor de reactie van de AI in een natuurlijke stem.
тАв Mogelijkheid om de stem van ChatGPT (tekst-naar-spraak stem) en taal aan te passen.
тАв Mogelijkheid om de spreeksnelheid van de AI aan te passen om de reactie langzaam of snel te horen.
тАв Aanpasbare opties voor het verzenden van berichten (automatisch verzenden na het spreken, bij gebruik van een aangepaste spraakopdracht of handmatig).
тАв Aanpasbare spraakopdracht om het invoerveld leeg te maken.
тАв Automatische detectie van de taal van reactieberichten voor tekst-naar-spraak.
тАв Voegt een voorlees- of luisterknop toe aan elk bericht om berichten opnieuw te beluisteren.
тАв Markeert de zin of frase waar je op dit moment naar luistert. Dit helpt het begrip te verbeteren.
тАв Eenvoudig aanpasbare sneltoetsen.
тАв Real-time antwoorden en gesprekken.
тАв Naadloze integratie van de spraakinterface, spraakchat en spraaktypen.

Met deze extensie kun je je stem gebruiken om:
тАв Met ChatGPT praten via je microfoon in meer dan 145 talen!
тАв Vragen stellen en antwoorden van ChatGPT horen met een natuurlijke stem.
тАв Aanpasbare spraakopdrachten gebruiken om berichten te verzenden en meer.

Perfect voor gebruikers die moe zijn van het typen van vragen en antwoorden naar de AI. Bovendien kun je ook gebruikmaken van de voorleesfunctie om de antwoorden van de AI terug te laten lezen in een duidelijke en natuurlijke stem. Deze functie is ideaal voor gebruikers die liever luisteren dan lezen, of die nieuwe talen willen leren door te luisteren naar de antwoorden van de AI in verschillende talen.

Deze extensie is eenvoudig te installeren en te gebruiken, en werkt naadloos samen met de bestaande functies van de AI. Installeer eenvoudigweg de extensie, zet de microfoon aan en begin te chatten met de AI als nooit tevoren! Spraakbesturing (spraakherkenning) is beschikbaar in meer dan 145 talen, waaronder Engels, Spaans, Mandarijn Chinees, Russisch, Hindi, Bengaals en meer.

Gebruiksaanwijzing:
тАв Na het installeren van de extensie, open de instellingen door te klikken op het тЪЩя╕П-pictogram naast het invoerveld van ChatGPT. Hier kun je de spraakbesturing en de taal van de spraakinvoer aanpassen, de spreeksnelheid aanpassen en aangepaste spraakopdrachten en sneltoetsen instellen om je ervaring persoonlijker te maken.
тАв Om spraakbesturing van ChatGPT te activeren, klik eenvoudig op het ЁЯОЩя╕П-pictogram of druk op de "Spatiebalk" buiten het invoerveld om te beginnen met spreken.
тАв Voor langere spraakinvoer met meerdere zinnen, houd de "Spatiebalk" ingedrukt totdat je klaar bent met spreken.
тАв Om een specifiek bericht te beluisteren of opnieuw te beluisteren, klik op het ЁЯФИ-pictogram aan de rechterkant van het bericht.
тАв Om het voorlezen aan of uit te zetten, klik eenvoudig op het ЁЯФИ-pictogram naast het invoerveld van de AI.

Aarzel niet om de instellingen te verkennen en je ervaring aan te passen aan jouw behoeften!
